description:
Whether you wish to learn for yourself or you would like to open your own lifestyle-center as a business, this training will benefit you. Lifestyle diseases negatively affect our western society greater than 75%. The majority of these diseases are preventable and reversible by changing lifestyle habits and the use of simple natural remedies and health principles.

Master the principles of health and healing using the simple and effective agencies of nature. Teach others and create your own health business.

Uniqueness of this program

This course is unique because it combines preventive medicine, detoxification, and the use of natural remedies and herbs. This course is based on Biblical principles.

Join our RISEN students and start your positive changes today!
title: RISEN - Diet, Detox, Herbs & Natural Remedies - Part 2
